articles.description: Prince Harry was extremely unimpressed by Elvis Presley's lavish Graceland mansion, claiming 'The King's interior designer must have been on acid.'

articles.title: Buckingham Palace hits back at criticism after King Charles' £20k journey on Royal Train - The Mirror
articles.description: Buckingham Palace said it must account for factors including 'security, time and cost' when making travel arrangements for the King after he used the Royal Train for a visit to the North of England
articles.content:
Buckingham Palace has defended King Charles for travelling to Manchester on the costly Royal Train this morning, despite his vow to slim the monarchy and cut down on spending.
